testimonials.message: To live life you need problems. If you get everything you want the minute you want it then what's the point of living?

testimonials.message: Some people just make the world a worse place to be in just by being around, Jake. That's right, bad apples. ‘Lock 'em all up,’ I say. At the bottom of the ocean, where it's too dark to see.
testimonials.name: Finn the human
